title: How to Make Coconut Sweetmeats

steps.headline: Mix powdered sugar, flour and salt.
Add coconut to egg white and gently mix.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a Silipat.
Drop cookie batter by spoonfuls onto prepared baking sheet.
Bake 20 minutes or until light brown.

text: Mix powdered sugar, flour and salt.  Add vanilla.  Beat egg white until stiff.  Add coconut to egg white and gently mix.  Fold into powdered sugar mixture.  Preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a Silipat.  Drop cookie batter by spoonfuls onto prepared baking sheet.  Bake 20 minutes or until light brown.  Remove from baking sheet.  Cool on wire cooling racks.  Store in an airtight container.
